SELECT * FROM (SELECT a.id, a.menu_name name, CASE a.menu_parent_id WHEN '0' THEN (CASE WHEN a.desktop_id IS NULL THEN 'winfixedpage00000000' WHEN LENGTH(a.desktop_id) = 0 THEN 'winfixedpage00000000' ELSE a.desktop_id END) ELSE a.menu_parent_id END pId, CASE (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sys_eve_menu c WHERE CASE a.menu_parent_id WHEN '0' THEN CONCAT(a.id, ',') ELSE CONCAT(a.menu_parent_id, a.id, ',') END = c.menu_parent_id) WHEN '0' THEN false ELSE true END isParent, (a.menu_level + 1) type, 'false' open, b.sys_name sysName, CASE a.menu_url WHEN '--' THEN '盒子' ELSE '页面' END pageType FROM sys_eve_menu a LEFT JOIN sys_eve_win b ON a.sys_win_id = b.id ORDER BY a.order_num ASC) m UNION SELECT a.id, a.auth_menu_name name, a.menu_id pId, false isParent, (b.menu_level + 1) type, 'false' open, c.sys_name sysName, '权限点' pageType FROM sys_eve_menu_auth_point a, sys_eve_menu b LEFT JOIN sys_eve_win c ON b.sys_win_id = c.id WHERE a.menu_id = b.id UNION ALL SELECT * FROM (SELECT a.id, a.desktop_name name, '0' pId, true isParent, '0' type, 'false' open, '基础系统' sysName, '桌面' pageType FROM sys_eve_desktop a WHERE a.state != '0' ORDER BY a.order_by DESC) k
